5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Qais bin ‘Amr said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) saw a man praying two Rak’ah after the Subh prayer and said, ‘Is the Subh prayer to be offered twice?’ The man said to him: ‘I did not pray the two Rak’ah before it, so I prayed them (now).’ The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) remained silent.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ فَاتَتْهُ الرَّكْعَتَانِ قَبْلَ صَلاَةِ الْفَجْرِ مَتَى يَقْضِيهِمَا
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the one who misses the two Rak’ah before Fajr Prayer when should he make them up?
